review: The Fire Stick was so much more than I thought it would be and so easy to install.
author: Barbara Sink

review: Well i hate to say this but it is not working for me right now?? And haven't had the time to figure out why!! Was working fine one day and then it nothing.?My husband has been trying to get help on the issue and is not getting the correct info. for our issue??pretty frustrating!!
author: Sarah D. Hildebrand

review: Beware!!!!  Don't buy this if you want to stream mlb tv. It is fine for stuff that isn't live, but a mess for live baseball.  Bought Roku 3 instead and it works great for MLB TV
author: B1

review: Did what we expected it to do...streaming shows from Netflix.
author: Marilyn T. Roan

review: I switched from Apple TV to Fire TV Stick, love it!
author: Amy Moore

review: I love it!  It is so nice not to have to mess with plugging in a computer to the tv any longer.  I was able to get caught up on Downton Abbey which is exclusive to Prime, and now I watch Netflix through this device as well. It does appear to work more quickly than when I use Netflix through our blue ray player connection.
author: Anthony J.

review: Misleading...basically useless if you don't purchase everything
author: LizZie

review: The functions this Firestick provides are great;however, the device has a ' boot up' problem each time you turn it on.
author: UFGatorJane
